name: Let's Stick Together (BaaBaaBop)
description:
Let's Stick Together is a simple puzzle game about making connections. You will help rejoin two lost friends, recollect yourself, and find the right mathematical formula for your friendship. 

A game about solving visual puzzles and mathematical obstacles. Armed with your wit and perseverance, you will find the way.

Made for the Lost Relic Games - GAME JAM by Lyndon (@BaaBaaBop) and Conner (@syc).

Controls Select and dragleft mouse buttonUndou
ctrl+z
right mouse buttonRestart levelrToggle fullscreenf
